constituent: brown, cloak, mexican bandit, muchacho, siesta, sun, day, aroma, bound up, spoon, sitting on the ground
heisigStory: The color of the serape or cloak of our muchacho on siesta is a dull brown, the color this kanji indicates.
koohiiStory1: Why is my package late? Imagine a UPS driver dressed in BROWN garments taking a siesta. What can BROWN do for you?
koohiiStory2: Mexicans use a cloak (pancho) for their siestas. Their color is usually brown.
myStory: nâu. áo choàng ngày có mùi tự là màu nâu. tai sao áo choàng có màu nâu
